message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that much for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $135? That feels like a fair compromise.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to pay that much for it.
